General.Name: Guangdong Hotata Technology Group Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Guangdong Hotata Technology Group Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of smart home products in China. It offers smart home products, including smart clothes drying machines, smart door locks, and other smart products; and floating drying racks, aluminum ladders, hanger sets, drying racks, towel racks, and other products. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Guangzhou, China.
